name: Beam (itch)
description:
Audiovisual Performance Scenes

Beam is a suite of scenes made for live performance to music. Submerse yourself in beautiful designer worlds that respond to music frequencies and control beams and particles with your hands.

This first version was created for the Leap Motion 3DJam. We look forward to creating new scenes and controls!

Requires a Leap Motion, can use an Oculus Rift DK2.
